Comment: 현재 과학계에서 많은 논란이 되고 있는, 유전자 조작 아기에 관한 이야기가 오늘 뉴스에서 다뤄집니다. 왜, 어떻게 유전자 조작을 하게 되었는지 알아볼 수 있는 좋은 계기가 될 것입니다.
EnglishComment: The story of a genetically modified baby, which is currently under debate in the scientific community, is covered in today's news. It's a good news to see why, how they've been genetically engineered.

Themes.Theme: Genetic editing and the debate surrounding a scientist's claim to have genetically altered twin babies in China.
A detailed look at how some residents in U.S. rural communities are impacted by unsafe drinking water.
